politics.title: India/Sep 23, 2025Kolkata heavy rainfall: Eight electrocuted as record rain disrupts life in Kolkata; air, rail, metro services hit- Top 10 pointsKolkata is grappling with severe flooding after record rainfall, leading to eight electrocution deaths and widespread disruption. Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has blamed poor dredging and the CESC for the crisis, announcing advanced Puja holidays and virtual inaugurations.

politics.title: India/Sep 23, 2025Delhi HC directs Patanjali to remove part of its 'disparaging' chyawanprash adsThe Delhi High Court has modified an order regarding Patanjali Ayurved's advertisement for its chyawanprash. Patanjali can now use the phrase "why settle for ordinary Chyawanprash," but must remove the phrase "made with 40 herbs" deemed disparaging to Dabur. The court noted that the remaining statement is permissible puffery and unlikely to deter consumers from buying Dabur Chyawanprash.
politics.content: India/Sep 23, 2025Delhi HC directs Patanjali to remove part of its 'disparaging' chyawanprash adsThe Delhi High Court has modified an order regarding Patanjali Ayurved's advertisement for its chyawanprash. Patanjali can now use the phrase "why settle for ordinary Chyawanprash," but must remove the phrase "made with 40 herbs" deemed disparaging to Dabur. The court noted that the remaining statement is permissible puffery and unlikely to deter consumers from buying Dabur Chyawanprash.
